text.div:
Acknowledgment code

CodeDescriptionDeutsch (German)Nederlands (Dutch)CommentVersion
AA Original mode: Application Accept - Enhanced mode: Application acknowledgment: Acceptakzeptiert durch AnwendungOriginal modus: Applicatiebevestiging - Enhanced modus: Applicatiebevestiging: accepteerfrom v2.1
AE Original mode: Application Error - Enhanced mode: Application acknowledgment: ErrorFehler in AnwendungOriginal modus: Applicatiefout - Enhanced modus: Applicatiebevestiging: foutfrom v2.1
AR Original mode: Application Reject - Enhanced mode: Application acknowledgment: RejectAbgelehnt durch AnwendungOriginal modus: Applicatieweigering - Enhanced modus: Applicatiebevestiging: weigerfrom v2.1
CA Enhanced mode: Accept acknowledgment: Commit AcceptBei Eingangsprüfung akzeptiert ("committed")Enhanced modus: Ontvangstbevestiging: accepteer ontvangstadded v2.2
CE Enhanced mode: Accept acknowledgment: Commit ErrorFehler bei EingangsprüfungEnhanced modus: Ontvangstbevestiging: fout in ontvangstadded v2.2
CR Enhanced mode: Accept acknowledgment: Commit RejectBei Eingangsprüfung abgelehntEnhanced modus: Ontvangstbevestiging: weigering te ontvangenadded v2.2
